headline.main: German Threat to Russians' Oil Is Focus of Don-Caucasus Battles; Resources and Supply Lines of Soviet Union Within Range of Nazi Thrust Surveyed as Vital to Course of War

lead_paragraph: With Germany's military forces thrusting into the Caucasus region, attention again is being focused on the vast oil resources of the Soviet Union and their importance in the immediate future on the military operations of both the United Nations and the Axis Powers.
abstract: Ger threat to USSR oil in Don-Caucasus drive discussed
